metadata.title: CVE-2014-4978 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The rs_filter_graph function in librawstudio/rs-filter.c in rawstudio mightallow local users to truncate arbitrary files via a symlink attack on (1)/tmp/rs-filter-graph.png or (2) /tmp/rs-filter-graph.

criterions.comment: rawstudio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
